mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (name, start_at, end_at, announce_start_at, announce_end_at, status, winner_phone_hash) VALUES (#{name}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{announceStartAt}, #{announceEndAt}, #{status}, #{winnerPhoneHash})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM event ORDER BY event_id DESC

SELECT *, CASE WHEN #{now} >= start_at AND #{now} <= end_at THEN 1 WHEN announce_start_at IS NOT NULL AND announce_end_at IS NOT NULL AND #{now} >= announce_start_at AND #{now} <= announce_end_at THEN 2 WHEN end_at IS NOT NULL AND #{now} > end_at AND announce_start_at IS NOT NULL AND #{now} < announce_start_at THEN 3 ELSE 4 END AS sort_priority FROM event ORDER BY sort_priority ASC, event_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT * FROM event WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET status = 'ENDED' WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND announce_end_at < #{now}
